creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: screens embroidered with Chinese characters in muted colors against faded blue background; screens are mounted within larger frame, two per frame (L panel)
text: Korean Court Banquet embroidered screens  with the Chinese characters for "good fortune" and "longevity" embroidered in a variety of conventional and unconventional script styles.
title: Longevity and good fortune
